title: Talking about Trouble - author introduces figure

content.question: The author introduces the figure of the "man who imagines his wits are failing" (Paragraph 4) primarily in order to

choices.label: emphasize the importance of maintaining people's confidence in their own abilities
appeal for greater sensitivity to be shown to people with mental afflictions
lament the extent to which people's self-esteem depends on others' opinion of them
point to a decline in the cultural authority of medical professionals

content.answer: emphasize the importance of maintaining people's confidence in their own abilities

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
